name: George Women's Plus-Size Millenium Suiting Pant
categoryPath: Clothing/Women's Plus/Women's Plus Bottoms/Women's Plus Pants

reviews.name: George Women's Plus-Size Millenium Suiting Pant
reviews.reviewText: These are very on trend ankle pants. Bought in the tan and black. Not sure if the Millenium Suiting Jacket tan will match the pants but would make a good suit for business. Well made and the fit is perfect. If you are shorter than 5'4" these would be full length pants on you.
reviews.title: Stylish ankle dress slacks

reviews.name: George Women's Plus-Size Millenium Suiting Pant
reviews.reviewText: CHEAP MATERIAL... I wore the pants one time, the threads were coming apart on the inner legs. The good thing is that I was able to return the pants.
reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!

reviews.name: George Women's Plus-Size Millenium Suiting Pant
reviews.reviewText: I like all the pants from Walmart. They are made from good quality material and they seem to understand plus women
reviews.title: Love them

reviews.name: George Women's Plus-Size Millenium Suiting Pant
reviews.reviewText: Fit me right away, no hemming!
reviews.title: perfect

reviews.name: George Women's Plus-Size Millenium Suiting Pant
reviews.title: Great value
